document.forum_title: Latest Asia-Pacific News on One News Page
document.discussion_title: Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border
document.topic_text: Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border Monday, 22 August 2016 ( 1 hour ago ) ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - Pakistani security forces have killed six people in a remote northwestern valley near the Afghan border in a new offensive against Islamist militants in the area, the military said. ISLAMABAD (AP) — Pakistan’s army says its jets and ground forces have destroyed six militant hideouts in a northwestern tribal region, killing nine... Seattle Times ISLAMABAD (AP) " Pakistan's army says its jets and ground forces have destroyed six militant hideouts in a northwestern tribal region, killing nine "terrorists"... New Zealand Herald Twitter asiankudos Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border https://t.co/hKmMvbl1L7 2 minutes ago ukworldnews Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border #WorldNews https://t.co/qssUqHJhKM 2 minutes ago Sarfraz Amjad RT @wittich : Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border https://t.co/divGhvF680 #worldnews 3 minutes ago Michael Witkowski Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border https://t.co/divGhvF680 #worldnews 3 minutes ago Manjeet Lall Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border: By Asad Hashim ISLAMABAD (Reuters) - Pakistani... https://t.co/NkaXCV26x2 3 minutes ago Geo News Urdu & Eng Pakistani forces kill six in new offensive near Afghan border https://t.co/XExRYL1hAN 5 minutes ago
